channel.title: Posts on Tse Xin's Work Experience at Science Centre DFS
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tse Xin's Work Experience at Science Centre DFS

item.title: Day 5
item.description: I learnt how to make simulations of circuits in TinkerCad and made a PowerPoint on it.

item.title: Day 4
item.description: I worked on a replica of level 2 of Science Centre. I also tried a drone simulator and programmed a drone to do certain actions.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: I made a replica of DFS in GatherTown and made PowerPoints on making a GatherTown space. I also worked on a PowerPoint on how to use FFMPEG to do simple video editing.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: I learnt how to use a laser cutter and made a few light boxes as tokens of appreciation.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: I learnt how to make a website using Visual Studio Code, Github, Gitbash etc.
